text: Open University of Israel (, HaUniversita HaPtukha) is a distance-education university in Israel. The main campus is located in the city of Ra'anana. , the Open University had taught around 39,000 students. Course examinations can be held at Israeli consulates and Jewish Agency offices around the world. == References == == Other websites == * Open University of Israel Category:Colleges and universities in Israel Category:Central District (Israel)
title: Open University of Israel
